src:
Heboh Foto Pria Bugil 'Protest Sharia Law' Muncul di Google Maps Banda Aceh
04 Nov 2019, 09:53 by Agus Setyadi
Banda Aceh - Warga Aceh dihebohkan oleh sebuah foto pria bugil saat mencari Banda Aceh di Google Maps. Pria itu terlihat telanjang bulat sambil menunjukkan tulisan 'Protest Sharia Law' di tangan kirinya.
Dilihat detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019), foto itu muncul di bagian foto ketika mencari Banda Aceh di Google Maps. Tampak ada dua foto bugil dari pria yang sama di lokasi berbeda.
Dalam foto pertama, terlihat si pria menggunakan topi abu-abu dan kacamata sambil memegang tongsis. Dia tampak menunjukkan telapak tangan kiri yang bertulisan 'Protest Sharia Law'.
Foto itu tampak diambil di lokasi terbuka. Ada latar pepohonan di belakangnya.
Dalam keterangannya, foto itu diambil pada Oktober 2019. Foto tersebut masuk ke bagian street view di Jalan TM Pahlawan.
Sementara pada foto kedua, terlihat pria tersebut berpose bugil di depan toilet. Dia tampak mengacungkan jempolnya.
Masih berdasarkan keterangan di Google Maps, foto itu juga merupakan street view di Jalan TM Pahlawan.

(agse/haf)
text:
Splashy Photos of 'Protest Sharia Law' Nude Men Appear on Google Maps in Banda Aceh
04 Nov 2019, 09:53 by Agus Setyadi
Banda Aceh - Aceh residents were shocked by a photo of a nude man while searching for Banda Aceh on Google Maps. The man looked completely naked while showing the words 'Protest Sharia Law' on his left hand.
Viewed detikcom, Monday (11/04/2019), the photo appeared in the photo section when searching for Banda Aceh on Google Maps. There appear to be two nude photos of the same man in different locations.
In the first photo, you can see the man wearing a gray hat and glasses while holding a stick. He seemed to show the palm of his left hand that reads 'Protest Sharia Law'.
The photo appears taken in an open location. There is a background of trees behind it.
In his statement, the photo was taken in October 2019. The photo entered the street view section on Jalan TM Pahlawan.
While in the second photo, seen the man posing naked in front of the toilet. He seemed to put his thumb up.
Still based on information on Google Maps, the photo is also a street view on Jalan TM Pahlawan.

(agse / haf)
